extendedIngredients.name: apple
extendedIngredients.original: 1 apple, cored and cut into 1-inch cubes (we use Honeycrisp if available. Gala, Fuji or Pink Lady apples work great too)

title: The Bitten Word's Roasted Brussels Sprouts With Bacon And Apples
summary: The Bitten Word's Roasted Brussels Sprouts With Bacon And Apples might be just the side dish you are searching for. This recipe makes 1 servings with 721 calories, 21g of protein, and 47g of fat each. For $4.52 per serving, this recipe covers 42% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. A mixture of apple, bacon, brussels sprouts, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so scrumptious. It is perfect for Christmas. 13 people have made this recipe and would make it again. It is a good option if you're following a caveman, gluten free, dairy free, and primal diet. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 40 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 96%. This score is outstanding. Try The Bitten Word's Sauteed Brussels Sprouts With Srirachan And Ca, The Bitten Word's Slow-baked Honeycrisp Apples, and Brussels Sprouts W/ Apples And Bacon for similar recipes.
